Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clockable
    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements Clockable
    Model a room that has a controlled heater. The room models the impact of external factors as disturbances that are furnished when the room is constructed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Room​(double[] tempDisturbance, double initialTemp)
      Create a room with disturbance array
